items.name: Ilorin Contemporary Canvas
items.short_description: A vibrant new art gallery showcasing avant-garde and traditional Nigerian art. It provides a platform for emerging local talents and hosts regular exhibitions.
items.address: Sola Saraki Arts Complex, Off Tanke Road, Ilorin.

items.name: Kwara Innovation Lounge
items.short_description: A dynamic co-working space and tech hub designed for innovators, entrepreneurs, and remote workers. Featuring a modern caf√©, private meeting rooms, and regular workshops.
items.address: Plot 5, Adewole Estate, Fate Road, Ilorin.

items.name: Royal Kids Playzone
items.short_description: Ilorin's premier indoor family entertainment center, offering a safe and exciting environment. Kids can enjoy trampolines, soft play areas, and a variety of arcade games.
items.address: Shoprite Complex, Off Fate Road, Ilorin.

items.name: The Asa Sky Lounge
items.short_description: Perched atop a new boutique hotel, this stylish rooftop bar offers panoramic views of Ilorin, signature cocktails, and a sophisticated ambiance perfect for an evening out.

items.name: Sobi Street Food Park
items.short_description: A vibrant open-air food park featuring a diverse array of local and international street food vendors. Enjoy live music and communal dining areas under the stars.
items.address: Opposite Sobi Hill Barracks, Ilorin East, Ilorin.

items.name: Oja Ilorin Heritage Hub
items.short_description: An interactive cultural center dedicated to preserving and showcasing the rich history, traditions, and arts of the Ilorin people. Experience engaging exhibits and cultural performances.
items.address: Beside Emir's Palace, Ilorin City Centre, Ilorin.

items.name: Harmony Garden & Arboretum
items.short_description: A sprawling botanical garden and arboretum offering serene walking trails, picnic spots, and a collection of indigenous and exotic plant species. An ideal escape into nature.
items.address: University of Ilorin Teaching Hospital Road, Ilorin.

items.name: Kwara Adrenaline Park
items.short_description: The ultimate adventure park featuring zip-lining, obstacle courses, paintball arenas, and a thrilling climbing wall for thrill-seekers of all ages. Perfect for group outings.
items.address: Off Old Jebba Road, Gaa Akanbi, Ilorin.

items.name: Gari Alimi Creatives Village
items.short_description: A vibrant collective where local artisans and craftsmen showcase and sell their handmade pottery, textiles, sculptures, and jewelry. Features live demonstrations and workshops.

items.name: Oasis Serenity Spa & Wellness
items.short_description: A luxurious urban spa offering a range of holistic treatments including massages, facials, and hydrotherapy. Step into a serene relaxation lounge for ultimate rejuvenation.
items.address: Off New Yidi Road, GRA, Ilorin.
